title: Autofill is the dumbest system
body:
Why?
There is a reason I don't put support as any of my roles. I don't want to play/I can't play it very well and combining those two means I'm probably gonna lose the game and not even enjoy any of it.

Thanks Riot, I really want to be forced to play the role I intentionally dont pick just because otherwise, it makes queue times longer. News flash, I dont give a shite if it takes 20 minutes for me to find a game so long as I get the bloody roles that I wanted rather than wait 5 and get something that is gonna piss me off for the next 40.

Oh wait, **I CANT EVEN LEAVE THE LOBBY WHEN I GET SUPPORT BECAUSE THEN I HAVE TO WAIT 30 MINUTES TO GET RID OF THE QUEUE DODGE, HOW FUCKING FANTASTIC, I DODGE BECAUSE I KNOW ITS GONNA BE A LOSS AND AN AWFUL EXPERIENCE FOR ME AND THE TEAM AND I GET PUNISHED.**

**I DONT FUCKING PUT SUPPORT OR ANY OTHER ROLE I DONT PICK FOR A GODDAMN REASON. THATS THE WHOLE BLOODY POINT OF DQ WHY THE HELL ARE YOU PULLING THIS SHIT.**

Seriously, add an option so I can opt out of it and not have to wait 30 minutes in the hopes that next lobby I will get a role I like/can play.

replies.body: are u fucking kidding? Holy shit Auto fill is basically support, you should of known that, its typically the least mained roll out there. Stop fucking complaining on the boards. You chose that fill roll and u were placed in a lobby that needed a support, if you cant play it don't fucking pick fill.

Sigh, I'm not talking about the role you can choose I mean the one that automatically activates late at night or at high elo. You can't turn it off and you don't choose it. Please don't be this rude on a topic that apparently you don't understand.
Ether you don't play at night or deal with it. To get to a higher division you have to learn all roles to a satisfactory level -> Divsion if not you really don't belong in that division
Stop being ignorant and read what he said.

I'm on my phone so not gonna bother quoting.. 
You said in your post that you would rather wait out a longer queue time to get the role that you want,  but then complain about getting support when you choose fill. Don't fucking pick fill you imbecile.

Ok another of these comments, please try to understand that I'm, not talking about the role 

> [{quoted}](name=LetsTwitch,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=QKTXmT3q,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-29T02:46:33.891+0000)
>
> Sigh, I'm not talking about the role you can choose I mean the one that automatically activates late at night or at high elo. You can't turn it off and you don't choose it. Please don't be this rude on a topic that apparently you don't understand.
I agree, the autofill is stupid and unfair, would much rather have longer waiting queue's!!

Most people replying here are retarded. Picking fill as a role and autofill are two different things. Getting any role other than what you queue as is stupid if there's no way to turn off that possibility. I don't play support because I'm not good at it, and I don't enjoy it. And then when I play bad or make a mistake, my team is blaming me and talking about reporting me. Fuck autofill and fuck Riot

Wind back to last year, where there was no primary and secondary, you got whatever the pick order was, and no one complained.

now you have a very small chance of getting something that isn't your main role, and everyone flips their shit! 

WTF is your problem support is 1/5th of the game, put some effort in and learn it, so that 1 in 100 chance that you get it, you know what to do.

I played last year, don't say people didn't complain because that's not true. My problem with this system is that the entire point of DQ was to get people the role they wanted and this undermines that.

That is my problem, Riot has just made DQ into SQ again.

There was a lot less complaining than right now, its been draft pick for the past 6+ years, people were used to it, and now that you are more likely to get your main, youre still not happy. Learn to take a win ffs
just swap roles in champ select regardless of what you're assigned, it's not hard.

For those people who don't know what OP is referring to:

>To address position shortages, weâ€™re adding an autofill mode that can trigger when queue times are too long. If players enter queue with excessive estimated wait times, the matchmaker will potentially assign them a role other than the two they selected.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/dynamic-queue-and-future-league

Yesterday was the first day I had experienced autofill and it was on _all day long_ (it actually still is). Since I'm a support main I got my preference 6 times in a row and as such I was never sure if autofill was on. Maybe it can give you your preference in some situations (eg if you want support) but I'm not sure. I agree it's frustrating when you don't get what you want though.

Well fill should not mean support. Riot should have catered the system so main/off = 60/40 or 70/30 , instead it turned into 0/100 or 10/90 if you picked support as the off role. Eventually everyone that off roled support got sick of only playing support and stopped queing for that position , this turned into a spiral and now theres a serious lack of support players.
